attributes.action: Abolish i54 Bus Lane Car Trap by Staffordshire County Council
attributes.additional_details:
see link for further info http://www.sstaffs.gov.uk/pdf/49136-i54%20new%20access%20leaflet%20a5%2011%20Dec%20.pdf

Clearly this has been placed to trap unsuspecting drivers that are traversing the new road layout from the M54 with £60 fines.
The new road was jointly funded by Land Rover Jaguar and could have been designed in order to have an extra lane adjacent to the road, how can Staffordshire county council also justify the extra use of fuel all the drivers need to use to go around the bus lane
attributes.background: i54 bus lane has been created to trap drivers leaving and trying to gain entry to the M54, blue information signs are positioned on the entry to the bus lane are are difficult to see when exiting the roundabouts.

rejection.details:
This is a matter for Staffordshire County Council. You can find out how to petition the council here:

http://www.staffordshire.gov.uk/yourcouncil/petitions/Home.aspx
